::KitKat::

She sighed and leaned back in her chair. She was afraid he would say 
that. She was scared for Drillbit. But then again, she wouldh have no 
way of knowing what was going to happen.  She looked at him,"No, 
Destructor is here, but out of the base.  He should be back soon. In 
the mean time, can I offer you something to eat or drink? I'm sure 
that from your long journey, and would like to freshen up. I have a 
spare room that you may use. Please, feel free to stay as long as you 
like. " she stood up and looked at the floor. Somehow, deep in her 
spark, she knew what would happen. She didn't want to admit it, but 
somewhere, somehow, she knew the answers. "Please, later on, I will 
wish to speak to you. I will contact you when I need to talk to you 
again." She walked out of the room and opened her link. "Drillbit, 
please see this guest to a spare room for the night. Thank you. When 
you are finished, please see me. I will need to talk to you."
